00027 // Info structs used by the event sink map

00029 __declspec(selectany) _ATL_FUNC_INFO BeforeNavigate2Info =
00030 { CC_STDCALL, VT_EMPTY, 7,
00031 { VT_DISPATCH, VT_VARIANT|VT_BYREF, VT_VARIANT|VT_BYREF, 
00032 VT_VARIANT|VT_BYREF, VT_VARIANT|VT_BYREF, VT_VARIANT|VT_BYREF, 
00033 VT_BOOL|VT_BYREF }
00034 };
00035 
00036 __declspec(selectany) _ATL_FUNC_INFO NavigateComplete2Info =
00037 { CC_STDCALL, VT_EMPTY, 2, { VT_DISPATCH, VT_VARIANT|VT_BYREF } 
00038 };
00039 
00040 __declspec(selectany) _ATL_FUNC_INFO StatusChangeInfo =
00041 { CC_STDCALL, VT_EMPTY, 1, { VT_BSTR }
00042 };
00043 
00044 __declspec(selectany) _ATL_FUNC_INFO CommandStateChangeInfo =
00045 { CC_STDCALL, VT_EMPTY, 2, { VT_I4, VT_BOOL }
00046 };
00047 
00048 __declspec(selectany) _ATL_FUNC_INFO DownloadInfo =
00049 { CC_STDCALL, VT_EMPTY, 0 
00050 };

00052 
00053 class CWtlHtmlView :
00054   public CWindowImpl<CWtlHtmlView, CAxWindow>,
00055   public IDispEventSimpleImpl<37, CWtlHtmlView, &DIID_DWebBrowserEvents2>
00056 {
00057 public:
00058   DECLARE_WND_SUPERCLASS(NULL, CAxWindow::GetWndClassName())
00059 
00060 
00061   CComPtr<IHTMLElement> m_pBody;
00062   CComPtr<IHTMLDocument2> m_spHTMLDocument;
00063   CComPtr<IWebBrowser2> m_spWebBrowser2;
00064   CComPtr<IWebBrowser> m_spWebBrowser;
00065   bool bBackEnable;
00066   bool bForwardEnable;
00067 
00068 
00069   CWtlHtmlView()
00070   {
00071     m_pBody = NULL;
00072     m_spHTMLDocument= NULL;
00073     m_spWebBrowser2= NULL;
00074     m_spWebBrowser= NULL;
00075     bBackEnable=true;
00076     bForwardEnable=true;
00077 
00078   }
00079   ~CWtlHtmlView()
00080   {
00081     if(m_spWebBrowser2!=NULL)
00082     {
00083       DispEventUnadvise ( m_spWebBrowser2 );
00084     }
00085   } 
00086   BOOL CWtlHtmlView::PreTranslateMessage(MSG* pMsg)
00087   {
00088     if((pMsg->message < WM_KEYFIRST || pMsg->message > WM_KEYLAST) &&
00089       (pMsg->message < WM_MOUSEFIRST || pMsg->message > WM_MOUSELAST))
00090       return FALSE;
00091 
00092     // give HTML page a chance to translate this message
00093     return (BOOL)SendMessage(WM_FORWARDMSG, 0, (LPARAM)pMsg);
00094   }
00095   LRESULT CWtlHtmlView::OnInitDialog(UINT /*uMsg*/, WPARAM /*wParam*/, LPARAM /*lParam*/, BOOL& /*bHandled*/)
00096   {
00097     return 0;
00098   }
00099   BEGIN_MSG_MAP(CWtlHtmlView)
00100     MESSAGE_HANDLER(WM_INITDIALOG, OnInitDialog)
00101   END_MSG_MAP()
00102 
00103 
00104   LRESULT TurnOffContextMenu()
00105   {
00106     HRESULT hr;
00107     CAxWindow wnd(m_hWnd);
00108     CComPtr<IUnknown> spUnk;          
00109     AtlAxGetHost(m_hWnd, &spUnk);       
00110     CComQIPtr<IAxWinAmbientDispatch> spWinAmb(spUnk);
00111     hr=spWinAmb->put_AllowContextMenu(VARIANT_FALSE);
00112     return SUCCEEDED(hr) ? 0 : -1;
00113   }
00114 
00115   BEGIN_SINK_MAP(CWtlHtmlView)
00116     SINK_ENTRY_INFO(37, DIID_DWebBrowserEvents2, DISPID_BEFORENAVIGATE2, OnBeforeNavigate2, &BeforeNavigate2Info)
00117     SINK_ENTRY_INFO(37, DIID_DWebBrowserEvents2, DISPID_NAVIGATECOMPLETE2, OnNavigateComplete2, &NavigateComplete2Info)
00118     SINK_ENTRY_INFO(37, DIID_DWebBrowserEvents2, DISPID_STATUSTEXTCHANGE, OnStatusChange, &StatusChangeInfo)
00119     SINK_ENTRY_INFO(37, DIID_DWebBrowserEvents2, DISPID_COMMANDSTATECHANGE, OnCommandStateChange, &CommandStateChangeInfo)
00120     SINK_ENTRY_INFO(37, DIID_DWebBrowserEvents2, DISPID_DOWNLOADBEGIN, OnDownloadBegin, &DownloadInfo)
00121     SINK_ENTRY_INFO(37, DIID_DWebBrowserEvents2, DISPID_DOWNLOADCOMPLETE, OnDownloadComplete, &DownloadInfo)
00122   END_SINK_MAP()
00123 
00124   virtual void __stdcall OnBeforeNavigate2 (
00125     IDispatch* pDisp, VARIANT* URL, VARIANT* Flags, VARIANT* TargetFrameName,
00126     VARIANT* PostData, VARIANT* Headers, VARIANT_BOOL* Cancel ){}
00127   virtual void __stdcall OnNavigateComplete2 ( IDispatch* pDisp, VARIANT * URL ){}
00128   virtual void __stdcall OnStatusChange ( BSTR bsText ){}
00129   virtual void __stdcall OnDownloadBegin(){}
00130   virtual void __stdcall OnDownloadComplete(){}
00131   virtual void __stdcall OnCommandStateChange ( long lCmd, VARIANT_BOOL vbEnabled )
00132   {
00133     bool bFlag = (vbEnabled != VARIANT_FALSE);
00134 
00135     if ( CSC_NAVIGATEBACK == lCmd )
00136     {
00137       bBackEnable = bFlag;
00138       OutputDebugString(CString("OnCommandStateChange Back=%d\n" , bBackEnable));
00139 
00140     }
00141     else if ( CSC_NAVIGATEFORWARD == lCmd )
00142     {
00143       bForwardEnable = bFlag;
00144       OutputDebugString(CString("OnCommandStateChange Forward=%d\n" , bForwardEnable));
00145     }
00146   }
00147 
00148   BOOL GetBody()
00149   {
00150     CComPtr<IDispatch> pDisp;
00151     CComVariant ve;
00152     // navOpenInNewWindow, navNoHistory,navNoReadFromCache,navNoWriteToCache
00153     // navAllowAutosearch,navBrowserBar,navHyperlink
00154     CComVariant vBrowserNav; 
00155     if(m_spHTMLDocument!=NULL)
00156       return 0;
00157     // Get the browser interface from the embedded HTML control
00158     if((m_spWebBrowser==NULL) && FAILED(QueryControl(__uuidof(IWebBrowser), reinterpret_cast<void**>(&m_spWebBrowser))) )
00159       m_spWebBrowser=NULL;
00160 
00161     if( SUCCEEDED(QueryControl(__uuidof(m_spWebBrowser2), reinterpret_cast<void**>(&m_spWebBrowser2))) )
00162     {
00163       if(m_spWebBrowser2!=NULL)
00164       {
00165         DispEventAdvise ( m_spWebBrowser2 );
00166         if(FAILED(m_spWebBrowser2->get_Document( &pDisp)))
00167           OutputDebugString(_T("get_Document Failed"));
00168         if(pDisp!=NULL) 
00169         {
00170           if(FAILED(pDisp->QueryInterface(IID_IHTMLDocument2, (void**)&m_spHTMLDocument))) 
00171             OutputDebugString(_T("QI IID_IHTMLDocument2 Failed"));
00172         }
00173 
00174       }
00175 
00176     }
00177     return FALSE;
00178   }
00179   HRESULT SetDocumentText( CString cstr)
00180   {
00181     _bstr_t str(cstr);
00182     HRESULT hr = S_OK;
00183     VARIANT *param;
00184     SAFEARRAY *sfArray;
00185     IHTMLDocument2 *document;
00186     BSTR bstr = str.Detach();
00187 
00188     // Creates a new one-dimensional array
00189     sfArray = SafeArrayCreateVector(VT_VARIANT, 0, 1);
00190 
00191     if(m_spHTMLDocument==NULL)
00192       this->GetBody();
00193 
00194     document= m_spHTMLDocument;
00195     if (sfArray == NULL || document == NULL) {
00196       hr=E_FAIL;
00197       goto cleanup;
00198     }
00199 
00200     hr = SafeArrayAccessData(sfArray,(LPVOID*) & param);
00201     param->vt = VT_BSTR;
00202     param->bstrVal = bstr;
00203     hr = SafeArrayUnaccessData(sfArray);
00204     hr = document->write(sfArray);
00205 
00206 cleanup:
00207     if (sfArray != NULL) {
00208       SafeArrayDestroy(sfArray);
00209     }
00210     return hr;
00211   }
00212   HRESULT Navigate(CString url)
00213   {
00214     USES_CONVERSION;
00215     CComVariant vurl((LPCWSTR) _bstr_t((LPCTSTR) url));
00216     CComVariant ve;
00217     CComVariant vBrowserNav; 
00218     GetBody();
00219     return m_spWebBrowser2->Navigate2(&vurl,
00220       &vBrowserNav, 
00221       &ve, //TargetFrameName _BLANK  _PARENT  _SELF _TOP  
00222       &ve, &ve);
00223 
00224   }
00225 
00226   bool QueryStatus( OLECMDID nCmdID, int value) 
00227   {
00228     OLECMDF eQuery ; //      'return value type for QueryStatusWB
00229     if(m_spWebBrowser2==NULL)
00230       return false;
00231 
00232     if(FAILED( m_spWebBrowser2->QueryStatusWB(OLECMDID_PRINT, &eQuery))) //  'get print command status
00233       return false;
00234 
00235     if(( eQuery & value) )
00236       return true;
00237     return false;
00238   }
00239 
00240 
00241 
00242   //OLECMDID_PRINT  = 6,
00243   HRESULT ExecCommand( OLECMDID nCmdID, OLECMDEXECOPT nCmdExecOpt, VARIANTARG* pvarargIn, VARIANTARG* pvarargOut) 
00244   {
00245     HRESULT hr=S_OK;
00246     LPDISPATCH lpDispatch = NULL;
00247     LPOLECOMMANDTARGET lpOleCommandTarget = NULL;
00248     try {
00249 
00250       m_spWebBrowser->get_Document(&lpDispatch);
00251       if(lpDispatch==NULL)
00252         throw;
00253       OLECMDF eQuery ; //      'return value type for QueryStatusWB
00254 
00255       if(FAILED( m_spWebBrowser2->QueryStatusWB(OLECMDID_PRINT, &eQuery))) //  'get print command status
00256         throw;
00257 
00258       if(!( eQuery & OLECMDF_ENABLED) )
00259         throw;
00260 
00261       lpDispatch->QueryInterface(IID_IOleCommandTarget, (void**)&lpOleCommandTarget);
00262       if(lpOleCommandTarget==NULL)
00263         throw;
00264 
00265       // Print contents of WebBrowser control.
00266       hr=lpOleCommandTarget->Exec(NULL, nCmdID, nCmdExecOpt, pvarargIn, pvarargOut);
00267     }
00268     catch(...)
00269     {
00270       hr=E_FAIL;
00271     }
00272     if(lpDispatch)
00273       lpDispatch->Release();
00274     if(lpOleCommandTarget)
00275       lpOleCommandTarget->Release();
00276     return hr;
00277   }
00278 
00279   //OLECMDID_PRINT  = 6,
00280   HRESULT OnExecCommand( OLECMDID nCmdID, OLECMDEXECOPT nCmdExecOpt, VARIANTARG* pvarargIn, VARIANTARG* pvarargOut) 
00281   {
00282     return m_spWebBrowser2->ExecWB(nCmdID, nCmdExecOpt, pvarargIn, pvarargOut);
00283 
00284   }
00285 
00286   void GoBack() 
00287   {
00288     if(m_spWebBrowser==NULL && FAILED(QueryControl(__uuidof(IWebBrowser), reinterpret_cast<void**>(&m_spWebBrowser))) )
00289       return;
00290     m_spWebBrowser->GoBack();
00291 
00292 
00293   }
00294   void GoForward() 
00295   {
00296     if(m_spWebBrowser==NULL && FAILED(QueryControl(__uuidof(IWebBrowser), reinterpret_cast<void**>(&m_spWebBrowser))) )
00297       return;
00298     m_spWebBrowser->GoForward();
00299 
00300   }
00301 };
